Title: Safeguard traffic order, ensure traffic safety
Designer: Shanxi Provincial Security Bureau (山西省公安局)Shanxi Provincial Traffic Bureau (山西省交通局)
Publisher: Shanxi Provincial Security Bureau (山西省公安局), Shanxi Provincial Traffic Bureau (山西省交通局)
Notes: In the center of the poster is Wuyi Square, Taiyuan ( 太原). The Mao memorial is no longer extant.
